verses.verse: Then all the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces<s%>, and <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah<s%>, and <S%H3153>Jezaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1955>Hoshaiah<s%>, and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> from the <S%H6996>least<s%> even unto the <S%H1419>greatest<s%>, came <S%H5066>near<s%>,

And <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, Let, we beseech thee, our <S%H8467>supplication<s%> be <S%H5307>accepted<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, and <S%H6419>pray<s%> for us unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, even for all this <S%H7611>remnant<s%>; (for we are <S%H7604>left<s%> but a <S%H4592>few<s%> of <S%H7235>many<s%>, as thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> do <S%H7200>behold<s%> us:) Let: or, Let our supplication fall before thee
That the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H5046>shew<s%> us the <S%H1870>way<s%> wherein we may <S%H3212>walk<s%>, and the <S%H1697>thing<s%> that we may <S%H6213>do<s%>.

Then <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> you; behold, I will <S%H6419>pray<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> according to your <S%H1697>words<s%>; and it shall come to pass, that whatsoever <S%H1697>thing<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H6030>answer<s%> you, I will <S%H5046>declare<s%> it unto you; I will <S%H4513>keep<s%> <S%H1697>nothing<s%> <S%H4513>back<s%> from you.

Then they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be a <S%H571>true<s%> and <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> between us, if we <S%H6213>do<s%> not even according to all <S%H1697>things<s%> for the which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H7971>send<s%> thee to us.

Whether it be <S%H2896>good<s%>, or whether it be <S%H7451>evil<s%>, we will <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, to whom <S%H580>we<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> thee; that it may be <S%H3190>well<s%> with us, when we <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>.
And it came to pass <S%H7093>after<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>.

Then <S%H7121>called<s%> he <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah<s%>, and all the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces<s%> which were with him, and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> from the <S%H6996>least<s%> even to the <S%H1419>greatest<s%>,

And <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, unto whom ye <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to <S%H5307>present<s%> your <S%H8467>supplication<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him;

If ye will <S%H7725>still<s%> <S%H3427>abide<s%> in this <S%H776>land<s%>, then will I <S%H1129>build<s%> you, and not pull you <S%H2040>down<s%>, and I will <S%H5193>plant<s%> you, and not pluck you <S%H5428>up<s%>: for I <S%H5162>repent<s%> me of the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that I have <S%H6213>done<s%> unto you.

Be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> <S%H6440>of<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, of <S%H6440>whom<s%> ye are <S%H3373>afraid<s%>; be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of him, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: for I am with you to <S%H3467>save<s%> you, and to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you from his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.
And I will <S%H5414>shew<s%> <S%H7356>mercies<s%> unto you, that he may have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> upon you, and cause you to <S%H7725>return<s%> to your own <S%H127>land<s%>.
But if ye <S%H559>say<s%>, We will not <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in this <S%H776>land<s%>, neither <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>,

<S%H559>Saying<s%>, No; but we will <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, where we shall <S%H7200>see<s%> no <S%H4421>war<s%>, nor <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%>, nor have <S%H7456>hunger<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%>; and there will we <S%H3427>dwell<s%>:

And now therefore <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, ye <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>; Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; If ye <S%H7760>wholly<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H6440>faces<s%> to <S%H935>enter<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> there;

Then it shall come to pass, that the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, which ye <S%H3373>feared<s%>, shall <S%H5381>overtake<s%> you there in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and the <S%H7458>famine<s%>, whereof ye were <S%H1672>afraid<s%>, shall follow <S%H1692>close<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you there in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; and there ye shall <S%H4191>die<s%>. shall follow: Heb. shall cleave after you

So shall it be with all the <S%H582>men<s%> that <S%H7760>set<s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> there; they shall <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, by the <S%H7458>famine<s%>, and by the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>: and none of them shall <S%H8300>remain<s%> or <S%H6412>escape<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that I will <S%H935>bring<s%> upon them. So: Heb. So shall all the men be

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; As mine <S%H639>anger<s%> and my <S%H2534>fury<s%> hath been poured <S%H5413>forth<s%> upon the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; so shall my <S%H2534>fury<s%> be poured <S%H5413>forth<s%> upon you, when ye shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: and ye shall be an <S%H423>execration<s%>, and an <S%H8047>astonishment<s%>, and a <S%H7045>curse<s%>, and a <S%H2781>reproach<s%>; and ye shall <S%H7200>see<s%> this <S%H4725>place<s%> no more.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1696>said<s%> concerning you, O ye <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>; <S%H935>Go<s%> ye not into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3045>certainly<s%> that I have <S%H5749>admonished<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%>. admonished: Heb. testified against you

For ye <S%H8582>dissembled<s%> in your <S%H5315>hearts<s%>, when ye <S%H7971>sent<s%> me unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H6419>Pray<s%> for us unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>; and according unto all that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%>, so <S%H5046>declare<s%> unto us, and we will <S%H6213>do<s%> it. ye dissembled: or, ye have used deceit against your souls

And now I have this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H5046>declared<s%> it to you; but ye have not <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, nor any thing for the which he hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> me unto you.

Now therefore <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3045>certainly<s%> that ye shall <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, by the <S%H7458>famine<s%>, and by the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>, in the <S%H4725>place<s%> whither ye <S%H2654>desire<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> and to <S%H1481>sojourn<s%>. to go: or, to go to sojourn
